article.title: Raytheon Awarded An Extension To U.S. Antarctic Support Program
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. National Science Foundation (NSF) has awarded Raytheon Polar Services, a division of Raytheon Technical Services Company, a one-year extension to its current contract for science, operations and logistics support to the U.S. Antarctic Program. Raytheon is the prime contractor to the U.S. Antarctic Program for the NSF. The extension moves the contract end date to March 31, 2011.
